橊字的基本解释

橊
liú
古同“榴”。

橊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
亦作“橊1”。
果木名。即石榴。

橊字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橊； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页552第29
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力求切，音榴。石橊，果名。【博物志】張騫使西域回所得。【博雅】若橊，石橊也。丹實垂垂若贅瘤也。【左思·蜀都賦】若橊競裂。【崔豹·古今註】一名丹若。　又橊橊，獸名也。【山海經】隂山有獸，其狀如貍，其音如橊橊。

橊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橊字的起名意思

暂无。

橊
liú
Gu Tong "liu".
橊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
Also known as "橊1".
Fruit tree name. Namely pomegranate.
橊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橊; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 552 29
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Strive for cutting, sound. Shi Li, fruit name. [Natural History] Zhang Qian returned to the Western Regions. [Bo Ya] Ruo Li, Shi Li also. Danshi is drooping like a tumor. [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Rumorously cracked. [Cui Bao·Gujin Note] A Dan Ruo.　 橊橊 again, the name of the beast. [Shanhaijing] There are beasts in Yinshan, which are like raccoon dogs, and their sounds are like licking.
